screenshot.caption: XMLC file open in Apple TextEdit

description: The Biomedis M device conducts bioresonance therapy via electromagnetic oscillations to help restore an organism's body rhythms after a disease has disrupted them. People often use the device with other treatments, including physiotherapy, homeopathy, and acupuncture.

Biomedis M Air organizes electromagnetic oscillation as therapeutic complex data. You can navigate to the location in which Biomedis M Air stores complexes by selecting the Complex tab within the Profile tab.
NOTE: Biomedis no longer sells the M device.
